snippet: General Motors’ recall of 1.6 million cars is a time-consuming process with many steps, including designing and testing the new parts, finding and informing owners, then fixing the vehicles.
abstract: General Motors faces arduous task of fixing cars less than a month after announcing it was recalling 1.6 million cars because of defective ignition switch; repair process is time-consuming one with many steps, including designing and testing new parts, finding and informing owners, then fixing vehicles.
lead_paragraph: General Motors’ recall of 1.6 million cars is a time-consuming process with many steps, including designing and testing the new parts, finding and informing owners, then fixing the vehicles.

headline.main: Now Comes Hard Part for G.M.: The Repairs
headline.print_headline: Now Comes Hard Part for G.M.: The Repairs
